name: Blocks Cube Color
description:
Blocks Cube Color is simple and addictive casual crush game!
HOW TO PLAY?
1.Simply drag the block pieces to move them.
2.Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
3.Blocks can't be rotated.
4.No time limits.
Feature:
Exquisite Game Interface!
Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages!
It is all FREE and No Wifi Need!
